concept.title: Field Converter
concept.shortdesc: The Field Converter converts the datatype of a field to a compatible datatype. You might use the Field Converter to convert the data type of a field before performing calculations.

conbody.p: Field ConverteroverviewWhen you convert a field, configure the conversion for an appropriate, compatible datatype. Consider the actual data in the field as well, since even valid conversions can cause truncation of data.
For example, converting a field from Integer to Decimal is valid. Converting a field from Decimal to Integer is also valid, but the conversion can cause truncation of any decimal values in the data.

You can use data preview to verify the data in the fields. When you convert a String field to Date or Datetime, you specify the date or datetime format that you want to use. You can use any valid format.
